alert.note: Alert for Meade; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 26 at 8:45PM MDT until August 26 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL HAAKON...SOUTHWESTERN ZIEBACH...EASTERN MEADE AND NORTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 845 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles northwest of Marcus to 4 miles south of Plainview to 8 miles northwest of Creighton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Faith, Plainview, Marcus, Bridger, Howes, White Owl, Red Scaffold, Opal, Takini and Durkee Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
